name: MAN Light Recon Vehicle
description: The Light Recon Vehicle is a lightweigth 4x4 capable of enduring the harshest of terrains. It is powered by a Hydrogen engine, has airdropping capabilities and it´s armed with a single Gatling gun in a middle-mounted pintle.
descriptiontechnical: The LRV has a block count of 204 and a weight of 16 tons. It has 2 parachutes for air-dropping capabilities.

name: MAN Light Attack Vehicle
description: The Light Attack Vehicle is an up-armored LRV 4x4 that trades protection for added firepower. It is powered by a Hydrogen engine, has airdropping capabilities and it´s armed with two Gatling gun pintles and a rocket launcher.
descriptiontechnical: The LRV has a block count of 204 and a weight of 16 tons. It has 2 parachutes for air-dropping capabilities.

name: MAN Recon Vertical Take-off & Landing
description: The RVTOL is a light ship capable of  hovering and reconnoissance. It is powered by a reactor, has airdropping capabilities and it´s armed with twin Gatling guns
descriptiontechnical: The LRV has a block count of 204 and a weight of 16 tons. It has 2 parachutes for air-dropping capabilities.
